channel.title: Comments on: Learning About Utah Government

item.title: By: Sterkworks
item.dc:creator: Sterkworks
item.description: Well welcome to Utah and kudos for trying to figure out how our state government works. I'm still trying to figure out how Chris Buttars keeps getting re-elected.
item.content:encoded: Well welcome to Utah and kudos for trying to figure out how our state government works. I’m still trying to figure out how Chris Buttars keeps getting re-elected.
